Nslhub_service_unavailable_message_descr: The Bot will send this message to Visitor if service is unavailable
Nslhub_handover_message_description: The Bot will send this message to Visitor upon handover
Nslhub_close_chat_message_description: This message will be sent automatically when a chat is closed
Nslhub_callback_message_description: Enabling this setting will allow the app to use only callback messages. This feature is useful when you are using Reminder messages in your Nslhub bot.
Nslhub_default_handover_department_descr: Enter the target department name where you want to transfer the visitor upon handover
Nslhub_hide_quick_replies_description: If enabled, then all quick-replies will hide when a visitor clicks on any one of them
